Entries.DialogueText: A Stardew Valley rose? That's so lovely! Thank you! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A Stardew Valley rose? That's so lovely! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Whenever I miss the valley, I'll smell this rose. Hehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whenever I miss the valley, I'll smell this rose. Hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, take this. It's been on the shelf for 10 years and no one has bought it. You can have it!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, take this. It's been on the shelf for 10 years and no one has bought it. You can have it!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, wow! Nothing says 'spring' like a Stardew Valley daffodil! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, wow! Nothing says 'spring' like a Stardew Valley daffodil!

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, that's so rare... I can't believe you're giving this to me! Thanks, honey!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, that's so rare... I can't believe you're giving this to me! Thanks, honey!

Entries.DialogueText: Ahh... even in winter, Stardew Valley has beautiful flowers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ahh... even in winter, Stardew Valley has beautiful flowers.

Entries.DialogueText: I heard there's a rare weather event in the valley.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard there's a rare weather event in the valley.

Entries.DialogueText: I wish it rained here sometimes... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wish it rained here sometimes...

Entries.DialogueText: How'd the big day go? Emily came up a while ago and told me all about your plans.
Entries.DisplayPattern: How'd the big day go? Emily came up a while ago and told me all about your plans.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll have to come visit you two on the farm sometime!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll have to come visit you two on the farm sometime!

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff*... Mmm... sweet peas have the most wonderful smell.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff*... Mmm... sweet peas have the most wonderful smell.

Entries.DialogueText: Hello hello, sweetie!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello hello, sweetie!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so glad that the bus is back in service. It was starting to get lonely out here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so glad that the bus is back in service. It was starting to get lonely out here.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I almost went out of business. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I almost went out of business.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, but now you're here to buy a whole bunch of seeds... right, sweetie? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, but now you're here to buy a whole bunch of seeds... right, sweetie?

Entries.DialogueText: You can find coconuts and cactus fruits outside. Feel free to take as many as you can find.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You can find coconuts and cactus fruits outside. Feel free to take as many as you can find.

Entries.DialogueText: They're oooh-yummy, too. Heeee!~ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They're oooh-yummy, too. Heeee!~

Entries.DialogueText: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emily in town, could you tell her I said 'Hi'?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emily in town, could you tell her I said 'Hi'?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: That shady-looking guy in the back? I'm not supposed to talk about it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That shady-looking guy in the back? I'm not supposed to talk about it.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway... what's the weather like in the valley?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway... what's the weather like in the valley?

Entries.DialogueText: You wouldn't have much luck farming out here, honey.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You wouldn't have much luck farming out here, honey.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, unless you were a cactus farmer. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, unless you were a cactus farmer.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi! Welcome to Sandy's Oasis, the number one destination in Calico Desert!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi! Welcome to Sandy's Oasis, the number one destination in Calico Desert!

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper* Did I sound professional? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper* Did I sound professional?

Entries.DialogueText: Make sure to check out our seasonal seed selection.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make sure to check out our seasonal seed selection.

Entries.DialogueText: You look really thirsty. Here, have a taste of this ice cold milk. [184]
Entries.DisplayPattern: You look really thirsty. Here, have a taste of this ice cold milk.

Entries.DialogueText: Tasty, huh? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Tasty, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: It's always sunny here, even in winter!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's always sunny here, even in winter!

Entries.DialogueText: Actually, it's a little hot for my tastes... my delicate skin burns quickly in the sun. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Actually, it's a little hot for my tastes... my delicate skin burns quickly in the sun.

Entries.DialogueText: That shady-looking guy in the back? I'm really not supposed to talk about it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That shady-looking guy in the back? I'm really not supposed to talk about it.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway... what's the weather like in the valley?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway... what's the weather like in the valley?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey... I think I can trust you. You can keep a secret, right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey... I think I can trust you. You can keep a secret, right?

Entries.DialogueText: *whisper* That guy in the back... it's some kind of exclusive club. I've never been inside myself, but they pay me a generous monthly rent so I don't ask any questions.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *whisper* That guy in the back... it's some kind of exclusive club. I've never been inside myself, but they pay me a generous monthly rent so I don't ask any questions.

Entries.DialogueText: SOOOOoo! How's that Stardew Valley weather right now?
Entries.DisplayPattern: SOOOOoo! How's that Stardew Valley weather right now?

Entries.DialogueText: My name's not really Sandy, you know. It's just good for business.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My name's not really Sandy, you know. It's just good for business.

Entries.DialogueText: But everyone calls me Sandy anyway, so I've just gotten used to it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But everyone calls me Sandy anyway, so I've just gotten used to it.

Entries.DialogueText: Isn't it expensive, coming to the desert so often like you do?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Isn't it expensive, coming to the desert so often like you do?

Entries.DialogueText: You must really like to see me, huh? Hmmm... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You must really like to see me, huh? Hmmm...

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... I do miss the beautiful flowers of Stardew Valley... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... I do miss the beautiful flowers of Stardew Valley...

Entries.DialogueText: Hi there, honey. Yep, it's just me, alone in this big old shop. Hmmm...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi there, honey. Yep, it's just me, alone in this big old shop. Hmmm...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, except for that creepy guy in the back. But he never moves a muscle, so I often forget about him.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, except for that creepy guy in the back. But he never moves a muscle, so I often forget about him.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, it's {Farmer_Name}! I'm glad to see you, kid. I was starting to think you'd never come back!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, it's ! I'm glad to see you, kid. I was starting to think you'd never come back!

Entries.DialogueText: If I didn't have this shop to run I'd come back to the valley with you for a day or two... just you and me on the old farm. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I didn't have this shop to run I'd come back to the valley with you for a day or two... just you and me on the old farm.

Entries.DialogueText: You'll just have to visit me more often so I don't get depressed. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'll just have to visit me more often so I don't get depressed.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi!~ Stay as long as you like.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi!~ Stay as long as you like.

Entries.DialogueText: The air conditioning sure feels nice, doesn't it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: The air conditioning sure feels nice, doesn't it?

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: A... customer?
Entries.DisplayPattern: A... customer?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi! Welcome to 'Sandy's Oasis'!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi! Welcome to 'Sandy's Oasis'!

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, you look just like the new farmer that Emily wrote to me about!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, you look just like the new farmer that Emily wrote to me about!

Entries.DialogueText: Then... the bus line to Stardew Valley is back in service! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Then... the bus line to Stardew Valley is back in service!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, I'm so happy! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, I'm so happy!

Entries.DialogueText: Please visit again soon, I get so bored out here.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please visit again soon, I get so bored out here.

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: The Stardew Valley community is truly one-of-a-kind... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The Stardew Valley community is truly one-of-a-kind...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?

Entries.DialogueText: I kind of miss the rain, actually... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I kind of miss the rain, actually...

Entries.DialogueText: Ooo! I absolutely love getting gifts from the valley. I'm so happy!~
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ooo! I absolutely love getting gifts from the valley. I'm so happy!~

Entries.DialogueText: This looks wonderful. Thanks so much!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This looks wonderful. Thanks so much!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... Um. Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... Um. Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* ...what is it?
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* ...what is it?

Entries.DialogueText: This is for me? Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is for me? Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: What happened? You're a club member?!
Entries.DisplayPattern: What happened? You're a club member?!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so happy to have an excuse to come to Pelican Town!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so happy to have an excuse to come to Pelican Town!

Entries.DialogueText: That was a lot of fun, thanks for inviting me! I'd better head home soon...
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was a lot of fun, thanks for inviting me! I'd better head home soon...

Entries.DialogueText: This is probably the busiest time of the year for me! It's nice to be able to see everyone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is probably the busiest time of the year for me! It's nice to be able to see everyone.

Entries.DialogueText: Not half bad, sweetie! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Not half bad, sweetie!

Entries.DialogueText: Come back soon, I'll have a new look waiting for you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Come back soon, I'll have a new look waiting for you!

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm, your backpack's looking a little full. Come back when you've made enough room for a full set of clothes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm, your backpack's looking a little full. Come back when you've made enough room for a full set of clothes.

Entries.DialogueText: Oops! That's my cue!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oops! That's my cue!

Entries.DialogueText: Knock, knock, honey! I'm coming in!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Knock, knock, honey! I'm coming in!

Entries.DialogueText: Let's see here...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let's see here...

Entries.DialogueText: Okay!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay!

Entries.DialogueText: That was fun! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was fun!

Entries.DialogueText: I hope you're as happy with your new look as I am! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope you're as happy with your new look as I am!

Entries.DialogueText: You're looking radiant!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're looking radiant!

Entries.DialogueText: I've put your old clothes in your backpack in case you have a change of heart. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've put your old clothes in your backpack in case you have a change of heart.

Entries.DialogueText: You poor burnt thing!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You poor burnt thing!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, a visitor!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, a visitor!

Entries.DialogueText: You look parched!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You look parched!

Entries.DialogueText: Rare seeds for sale!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Rare seeds for sale!

Entries.DialogueText: Sweetie, won't you buy something?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sweetie, won't you buy something?
